title: HustleNonStop
author: HustleNonStop
content: I need long term business partners to help me with certain things and I can also be a very good resource for you . I’m in the states and there is many things you guys need me for as well as I need you . Let’s make this $$$. HMU today any time .Whatsapp: +1 3415009920Telegram: @CryptoGod187ICQ: @GetMoney187

comments.author: Newchanka
comments.body: This sure sounds like an everyday scam. Why would you use a new account if you're genuine? You should explain exactly what this is all about. Not even people from those poor countries would fall for your trick.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: If I may ask, what is the nature of this deal you are wanting a Nigerian and a Kenyan to do for you? Does the deal requires only those two country men to accomplish or are there no other person fit for the deal?  Here you are saying they need you while in the real sense you are requesting them to chat you up for deal here so who is needing each other now for the deal? When you are the one putting up the offer.Nevertheless, you can reach out to both country men through their local boards and see how it goes if you can be able to get their attention for your deal.
